# [Story] ORB-060: Implement Variant Generator

## Parent Epic
Parent: #520 (Creative Factory)

## Description
Build AI-powered variant generator that creates ad variations including copy alternatives, image suggestions, and A/B test variants from seed content.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Generate multiple copy variations with different tones, lengths, and CTAs
- [ ] AI image suggestions based on copy and target audience
- [ ] A/B test variant creation with statistical significance calculators
- [ ] Variant comparison view with predicted performance scores
- [ ] Batch generation for creating variants across multiple ad formats

## Technical Notes
- Use Claude API for copy generation with prompt engineering for brand voice
- Integrate with image generation APIs for creative suggestions
- Implement variant scoring model trained on historical ad performance data
